title: Sampler, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: counted and uncounted stitches; cross and satin stitches on plain weave foundation
creditline: Bequest of Rosalie Coe, from the collection inherited from her mother, Eva Johnston Coe
description: Scattered motifs including flowers, crowns, animals, birds, and Adam and Eve with the Tree of Knowledge in colored silks, predominantly green and yellow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: counted and uncounted stitches; cross and satin stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Rosalie Coe, from the collection inherited from her mother, Eva Johnston Coe. 1974-42-15.
